channel.title: Jokes of any kind!
channel.description:
the most of us like jokes right?well if you have a funny joke to tell share it here with us! here are some jokes I found funny(yo momma jokes lol):
Yo mama so fat when her beeper goes off, people thought she was backing up
Yo mama so fat she was floating in the ocean and spain claimed her for then new world
Yo mama so fat she put on her lipstick with a paint-roller
Yo mama so fat when she steps on a scale, it read "one at a time, please"
Yo mama so stupid she got locked in a mattress store and sleep on the floor
Yo mama so stupid it took her 2 hours to watch 60 minutes
Yo mama so stupid when your dad said it was chilly outside, she ran outside with a spoon
Yo mama so stupid she could trip over a cordless phone! -----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
they don't have to be yo momma jokes but I was just using them as an exmaple lol I found these jokes on this site: [url=http://www.ahajokes.com/yo_mama_jokes.html]YO MOMMA JOKES[/url]

item.title: Jokes of any kind!
item.dc:creator: @Javafire Javafire
item.description:
@Javafire wrote:

[quote=“blo0d pker, post:19, topic:382416”][quote author=Javafire link=topic=478212.msg3500108#msg3500108 date=1297656459]

I got another joke, tell me watcha think of this one…

A blind man walks into a store with his seeing eye dog. All of a sudden, he picks up the leash and begins swinging the dog over his head. The manager runs up to the man and asks, “What are you doing?!!” The blind man replies, “Just looking around.”

stupid… where’s the comedy in that?
[/quote]
you dont get it?he uses a seeing eye dog to be able to get around as if it were a pair of eyes or so. so swinging the dog around is meaning he’s looking around <.<[/quote]
no i get it, i’m just not amused.

Read full topic

[/quote]
stupid… where’s the comedy in that?[/quote]
you dont get it?he uses a seeing eye dog to be able to get around as if it were a pair of eyes or so. so swinging the dog around is meaning he’s looking around <.<

item.title: Jokes of any kind!
item.dc:creator: @Javafire Javafire
item.description:
@Javafire wrote:

[quote=“mandood77, post:13, topic:382416”]im hoping bad jokes are okay…

okay so what does a fish say when he hits a wall?

DAM!

because beavers make dams and the fish bumped into it…

err…[/quote]
mine is better.

[quote=“Javafire, post:2, topic:382416”]"I heard a joke once: Man goes to doctor. Says he’s depressed. Says life is harsh and cruel. Says he feels all alone in a threatening world. Doctor says, “Treatment is simple. The great clown Pagliacci is in town tonight. Go see him. That should pick you up.” Man bursts into tears. Says, “But doctor… I am Pagliacci.” Good joke. Everybody laugh. Roll on snare drum. Curtains.
"[/quote]

Read full topic

item.title: Jokes of any kind!
item.dc:creator: @Javafire Javafire
item.description:
@Javafire wrote:

"I heard a joke once: Man goes to doctor. Says he’s depressed. Says life is harsh and cruel. Says he feels all alone in a threatening world. Doctor says, “Treatment is simple. The great clown Pagliacci is in town tonight. Go see him. That should pick you up.” Man bursts into tears. Says, “But doctor… I am Pagliacci.” Good joke. Everybody laugh. Roll on snare drum. Curtains.
"

Read full topic
